column2: an A.M. Eatery////I did not head the warnings of the wait times enough.  My suggestion is to put your name down for a table (they don't take reservations ahead of time)
column3: walk around the corner to the Blacksmith Cafe for pre-brunch/coffee/biscuits
column4: or just anywhere else in the general area
column5: while you wait for Snooze to text you that your table is ready.  They let people wait inside and by the bar
column6: but there are so many people waiting there's no room; I waited in line at the bar and never got to the front; they have a small space outside with games as well
column7: but I couldn't bear it in the Houston heat.
